article_title: Israeli ground forces pushing into southern Gaza
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  more  than  500  people  have  been  killed  since  the  bombing  resumed.

article_title: Israeli ground forces pushing into southern Gaza
sentence: More  than  15,500  people  have  been  killed  in  the  strip  since  the  war  began,  the  ministry  also  said.

article_title: Israeli ground forces pushing into southern Gaza
sentence: Israel  began  its  retaliatory  bombing  of  Gaza  following  Hamas's  attacks  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  which  saw  around  1,200  people  killed  and  240  taken  hostage.
